name: ClassicMenu Indicator
summary: Indicator applet to show the Gnome Classic main menu
description:
ClassicMenu Indicator is a notification area applet (application indicator) for the top panel of Ubuntuâ€™s Unity desktop environment and other environments that support the AppIndicator protocol.

It provides a simple way to get a GNOME Classic-style application menu for those who prefer this over the Unity dash menu.
